headline: Berkshire Hathaway Inc. (BRK-B) Ends Its 17-Year Stake in BYD, TD Cowen Reduces PT
summary: Berkshire Hathaway Inc. (NYSE:BRK-B) is one of the 13 Best Diversified Stocks to Buy According to Hedge Funds. On September 21, 2025, Berkshire Hathaway Inc. (NYSE:BRK-B) ended its 17-year stake in BYD, an investment that grew more than 20 times since its 2008 entry. The company’s management expressed gratitude, while BYD adviser Altavilla dismissed speculation […]

headline: Does the Recent Apple Stake Increase Change the Outlook for Berkshire in 2025?
summary: If you are staring at Berkshire Hathaway’s stock price today and wondering whether to buy, hold, or simply watch, you are not alone. This iconic conglomerate, led by Warren Buffett, has a track record that inspires both loyalty and debate. Recent months have shown steady yet unspectacular gains, with the stock up 1.3% over the last week and 0.7% in the past month. Year to date, the return stands at a solid 11.0%. Looking back over three and five years, the gains are even more impressive at...
